item.title: Roadmap to an Open Source Artificial Pancreas & Diabetes monitoring with Flask
item.description:
Description

Nightscout + Python + Voice + SMS - Using tech for good!

Open Source has crossed frontiers and is widely used to solve problems in the health & science fields. In this talk weâ€™ll learn about the many moving parts of continuous glucose monitoring for type 1 Diabetes as part of the open-source artificial pancreas project and building a notifier for the most used OSS continuous glucose monitoring dashboard: Nightscout.
item.dc:creator: Diana Rodriguez Manrique
